name: Percept
description:
Created in about two weeks for the Rogue Like Engine Jam, Percept is an open-world adventure roguelike about traversing an endless number of randomly generated levels.

You are a lone explorer trapped in a strange and dark world. Will you escape, or will you fall victim to the monsters within?

Slay enemies, earn upgrades, and advance through the lands of Percept.

Developed using C++ and the Allegro 5 multimedia library. This project is open-source!

Click here for the original game releases and source code as of the Rogue Like Engine Jam deadline of 01/01/2022 7AM EST.

Gameplay Tips

  • Each level contains several enemy areas, including one boss area. You must explore the level in order to find these.
  • Before fighting the boss, try to slay weaker enemies for upgrades. Each level increases in difficulty!
  • This game features perma-death!

Controls

  • Movement: W, A, S, D
  • Interaction: F
  • Pause: ESCAPE
  • Shoot: Left Mouse Button
